rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: Large entrance hall that doubles as living area with Art Deco elements. Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated into walls for ample natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living room featuring bold geometric patterns and elegant detailing typical of Art Deco design. Open concept layout with integrated dining area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Formal dining area that complements the living room and follows Vastu principles by maintaining a balanced environment. Floor-to-ceiling windows enhance the ambience.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: Art Deco styled door with glass accents that allows for an inviting entrance into the penthouse. Placed on the west-facing wall to align with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Floor-to-Ceiling Window
openings.description: Extensive window installation along the western facade, maximizing natural light and ensuring a seamless indoor-outdoor connection.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Lavish master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom. Incorporates Art Deco details such as geometric patterns and luxe materials, with a floor-to-ceiling window for privacy while ensuring natural light. Vastu-aligned layout encourages relaxation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom featuring minimalist Art Deco accents and a private balcony with floor-to-ceiling windows for optimal light. Designed in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Compact study area integrated within the penthouse design. Features elegant Art Deco elements and functional layout suitable for a bachelor pad. Includes window views aligned with Vastu.

openings.name: Stairs
openings.description: Elegant staircase connecting ground and first floors, designed with Art Deco detailing.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows on the balcony area of the guest bedroom providing a view of the garden and ensuring adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Garden Deck/Patio
rooms.description: Expansive garden deck with floor-to-ceiling windows and decorative railings. Ideal for relaxation and social gatherings while enjoying a large garden view.

openings.name: Roof Deck Window
openings.description: Large window installation on the roof deck offering sweeping views of the cityscape, adhering to both aesthetic and Vastu guidelines.
